greeting_templates: {grump_mention} Hey grump, how are you doing today? 🤖
{grump_mention} Grump! How's it going, buddy? Hope you're having a good one! 😊
{grump_mention} What's up grump? How are you feeling today? 👋
{grump_mention} Hey there grump! How are things on your end? 🌟
{grump_mention} Grump, my friend! How are you doing? Hope all is well! 💫
{grump_mention} I'm just here to chat, grump! What's on your mind? 👀
{grump_mention} Guess who isn't cheeking your mf depos! 😱
{grump_mention} Can you explain Roblox to me? 🤔
{grump_mention} If your name was chuck and you were able to, How much wood do you think ol' chuck (you) could chuck if chuck was even capable of chucking wood? 🪵

{grump_mention} WHAZZZZZZZZZZZZZUP! 🤡

{grump_mention} No one here came in peace! 👽
{grump_mention}  $20 says your jelly of my jellies! 🪼
{grump_mention} Imagine this, if I was a robot, I would be a robot! 👾

{grump_mention} SOMEBODY STOP ME! 🎭
{grump_mention} To troll or not to troll, that is the question! 🎟️

{grump_mention} I'll have what she's having... said no grump ever! 🍽️
{grump_mention} You talking to me? You talking to me? Well I'm the only one here! 🚕
{grump_mention} I see dead people... just kidding, only grumps! 👻
{grump_mention} Show me the money! Oh wait, you don't have any 💸
{grump_mention} Life finds a way... especially grumpy life! 🦖
{grump_mention} I'm going to make him an offer he can't refuse... 5 minutes of your time! 🕰️
{grump_mention} Toto, I've a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore! 🌪️
{grump_mention} Why so serious, grump? Let's put a smile on that face! 😈
{grump_mention} Say hello to my little friend! Actually, I don't have one 🐭
{grump_mention} Elementary, my dear grump! 🔍
{grump_mention} Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn! But I actually do! 💝
{grump_mention} Heeeeere's grumpy! 🚪
{grump_mention} I'm Spartacus! No wait, you're grump! ⚔️
{grump_mention} I am your father! Search your feelings, you know it to be true! 🌌
{grump_mention} Do you feel lucky, grump? Well, do ya, punk? 🎲
{grump_mention} Go ahead, make my day! Actually just tell me about yours! ☀️
{grump_mention} You've got to ask yourself one question: 'Do I feel grumpy?' Well, do ya? 🤔
{grump_mention} I love the smell of grump in the morning! ☕
{grump_mention} Fasten your seatbelts, it's going to be a bumpy grump night! 🎬
{grump_mention} After all, tomorrow is another grumpy day! 🌅
{grump_mention} Round up the usual suspects... starting with you grump! 👮
{grump_mention} Of all the Discord channels in all the world, you had to walk into mine! 🚶
{grump_mention} We'll always have Paris... but right now we have this server! 🇫🇷
{grump_mention} Louis, I think this is the beginning of a beautiful grump friendship! 👬
{grump_mention} Play it, Sam. Play 'As Time Goes By'... but make it grumpy! 🎹
{grump_mention} I have always depended on the kindness of strangers... and grumps! 🎭
{grump_mention} Stella! Hey, Stella! Oh wait, wrong name! Grump! 🗣️
{grump_mention} What we've got here is failure to communicate... with grumps! 📢
{grump_mention} Badges? We ain't got no badges! We don't need no badges! 🎖️
{grump_mention} I drink your milkshake! I drink it up! 🥤
{grump_mention} I'm walking here! I'm walking here! 🚶‍♂️
{grump_mention} Attica! Attica! Actually just tell me about your day! 📣
{grump_mention} Forget it, Jake. It's Grumptown! 🏙️
{grump_mention} I'm mad as hell, and I'm not going to take this anymore! 😤
{grump_mention} Love means never having to say you're sorry... unless you're grumpy! 💕
{grump_mention} They may take our lives, but they'll never take our grump! 🏴
{grump_mention} The first rule of Grump Club is: you do not talk about Grump Club! 🥊
{grump_mention} I see you're drinking 1%. Is that 'cause you think you're fat? 🥛
{grump_mention} That'll do, grump. That'll do. 🐷
{grump_mention} Carpe diem. Seize the day, grumps! 📅
{grump_mention} Houston, we have a problem... you're too grumpy! 🚨
{grump_mention} My precious... oh wait, that's just my grump! 💍
{grump_mention} You shall not pass! Actually, please do come in! 🧙‍♂️
{grump_mention} One does not simply stop being grumpy! 🗡️
{grump_mention} Winter is coming... and so are more grumpy questions! ❄️
{grump_mention} Valar morghulis... all men must grump! ⚔️

{grump_mention} Hulk smash! Actually Hulk just wants to chat! 💪
{grump_mention} I could do this all day! But I'll settle for a quick chat! 🛡️
{grump_mention} On your left! Actually on your screen! 🏃
{grump_mention} Avengers assemble! Actually just you assemble here! 🦸
{grump_mention} I have nothing to prove to you! Except maybe a quick hello! 🗡️
{grump_mention} Dread it. Run from it. Destiny still arrives... and so do I! 🌌
{grump_mention} Perfectly balanced, as all things should be... including grumpiness! ⚖️
{grump_mention} I am inevitable! And also curious about your day! ⏰
{grump_mention} Mr. Stark, I don't feel so good... actually I feel great! How about you? 🕷️
{grump_mention} With great power comes great responsibility... to answer my questions! 🕸️
{grump_mention} I'm Batman! Actually I'm just a bot asking about your day! 🦇
{grump_mention} Why do we fall, grump? So we can learn to pick ourselves up! 🦇
{grump_mention} It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me! 🎭
{grump_mention} Swear to me! Actually just tell me how you're doing! 🤞
{grump_mention} You either die a hero, or live long enough to see yourself become the grump! 🦸
{grump_mention} I'm the Joker baby! Actually I'm just here to chat! 🤡
{grump_mention} Why so serious? Let's turn that frown upside down! 😊
{grump_mention} Do you want to know how I got these scars? From asking too many questions! 😅
{grump_mention} You complete me! Actually you complete this server! 💝
{grump_mention} Here's Johnny! Oh wait, wrong reference! Here's grump! 🪓
{grump_mention} All work and no play makes grump a dull boy! 📚
{grump_mention} Redrum! Redrum! Actually just good morning! ☀️
{grump_mention} Come play with us, grump! Forever... and ever... and ever! 👭
{grump_mention} I see dead people... just kidding, only very alive grumps! 👻
{grump_mention} I want to play a game... actually just want to chat! 🎮
{grump_mention} Live or die, grump? Make your choice! Actually just tell me about your day! 🎲

{grump_mention} I see you! Actually I see your messages! 👁️

{grump_mention} Stupid is as stupid does... but grumpy is as grumpy does! 🤪

{grump_mention} Could I BE any more curious about your day? 📺
